output_list.description: mintToken function allows attackers to increase total supply arbitrarily, aka 'token Devalue' issue.
transfer function allows attackers to transfer tokens to any address, bypassing the freezeAccount modifier.
transferFrom function allows attackers to transfer tokens from any address, bypassing the freezeAccount modifier.
approve function allows attackers to approve any address to spend their tokens, bypassing the freezeAccount modifier.
approveAndCall function allows attackers to approve any address to spend their tokens, bypassing the freezeAccount modifier.
